name: Synth Pop Idle
description:
Note: Initial load time may take a minute or so.

It is the year 3,000,000 AD. In the cosmic future, a rogue algorithm has combined the two most cursed game genres of all time, "gacha money sink" and "incremental idle timewaster" into one game about forming a robot musical band in ways that defy common sense.

Played with the mouse only.

(Tip: If you pull on the Mystery Limited banner when you have the full band... something good might happen.)

Created in 48h for Mix and Game Jam 2020
Code and writing by Fredison
Art by Pyromantic
Music by Dmytro Nebesh
